sentences.en: 'Why go out for hamburger when you have steak at home?' he once remarked.
sentences.cn: 纽曼曾经说道，“如果家里有了牛排，为什么要出去找汉堡？”

sentences.en: A hamburger and a coke.
sentences.cn: 一个汉堡和一杯可乐。

sentences.en: a hamburger with all the fixings
sentences.cn: 有各种配料的汉堡包

sentences.en: And now to make sure we've got the hamburger patties.
sentences.cn: 现在确定一下我们带了汉堡碎肉饼.

sentences.en: And one of the most popular menu items was the hamburger.
sentences.cn: 其中最流行的菜单之一是汉堡包.

sentences.en: Avoid unhealthy foods such as hamburger and chips.
sentences.cn: 不要吃不健康食品，如汉堡和薯条。

sentences.en: But the face of the hamburger is changing according to the times.
sentences.cn: 但汉堡包的面貌随着时代的发展在改变.

sentences.en: But the hot dog was replaced by the hamburger by the early 1950 s.
sentences.cn: 但热狗在五十年代初期就被汉堡代替了.

sentences.en: He ordered a hamburger.
sentences.cn: 他要了一份汉堡包.

sentences.en: However, people in other places claim that they invented the hamburger.
sentences.cn: 然而其它地方的人们说他们发明了汉堡包.

sentences.en: I can hot the hamburger up in a minute.
sentences.cn: 我马上就能把汉堡包热好.

sentences.en: I order a soda and a hamburger for myself. Then another person gets coffee for me.
sentences.cn: 嗯， 我为自己点了一杯苏打和一个汉堡包， 然后另外一人给我拿了杯咖啡。

sentences.en: I'd like to order a hamburger and fries.
sentences.cn: 来个汉堡包和薯条吧.

sentences.en: John would ask, biting into a juicy hamburger.
sentences.cn: 约翰一边咬着多汁的汉堡包,一边问.

sentences.en: Mike and I had a hamburger this afternoon, and we talked.
sentences.cn: 今天下午Mike和我一起吃汉堡, 一起讨论.

sentences.en: So tell me. Why go back to hamburger after eating steak?
sentences.cn: 所以请告诉我，为什么有烤肉吃了还要回头啃汉堡呢？

sentences.en: The seller realized this person's craving for a hamburger.
sentences.cn: 销售者了解到这个人急于买到汉堡包.

sentences.en: The whole stadium stink of the hamburger.
sentences.cn: 整个体育场内散发着汉堡包的香味。

sentences.en: Then have a hamburger.
sentences.cn: 那么吃一个汉堡吧。

sentences.en: We stopped at a drive-in for a hamburger.
sentences.cn: 我们在一家“免下车”餐馆停下来吃汉堡包。

sentences.en: You can't eat either hamburger meat or ice cream in your hands.
sentences.cn: 你不能用手拿着汉堡包的肉饼或奶油冰淇淋吃.

words.tran_cn: 汉堡包，汉堡；牛肉饼，肉饼；碎牛肉

trans.tran_en: a flat round piece of finely cut beef(= meat from a cow ) which is cooked and eaten in a bread bun
a flat round piece of finely cut beef(= meat from a cow ) which is cooked and eaten in a bread bun
